articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Declares Strong Counter- Measures against UNSC's "Resolution 1874"
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Declares Strong Counter- Measures against UNSC's "Resolution 1874"
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea issued the following statement Saturday in connection with the fact that at the instigation of the U.S., the United Nations Security Council has finally adopted a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its second nuclear test:
					  On June 12, the United Nations Security Council, at the instigation of the U.S., has finally adopted a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its second nuclear test. 
					
					 This is yet another vile product of the U.S.-led offensive of international pressure aimed at undermining the DPRK's ideology and its system chosen by its people by disarming the DPRK and suffocating its economy. 
					
					 The U.S. and Japan, not content with this "resolution", are hatching dirty plots to add their own "sanctions" to the existing ones against the DPRK by framing up the fictional issues of "counterfeit money" and "drug trafficking". 
					
					 The U.S. incited the United Nations Security Council to get more deeply embroiled in its attempt to stifle the DPRK, which resulted in the creation of an unprecedentedly acute tension on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 This confrontation was sparked off by unlawful strong arm actions of the U.S. and its obedient UNSC in denial of the legitimate right of a sovereign state to launch satellites. 
					
					 The UNSC's April 14th "presidential statement" orchestrated by the U.S. does not hold any ground in view of international law. 
					
					What permeates this statement is none other than animosity against and rejection of a country that has a system different from theirs along with an arrogant and arbitrary view that a small country must obey a large one. 
					
					 The DPRK is a small country, but it is a political, ideological and military power. 
					
					 If this high-handed act of the U.S. is tolerated, the DPRK will no longer be entitled to launch satellites again --which everyone else does-- but will forever be deprived of its right to use outer space. 
					
					  The DPRK's second nuclear test is a self-defensive measure as it was conducted to cope with such hostile acts of the U.S. and this does not run counter to any international law. 
					
					 In essence, this confrontation is an issue related to the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK rather than an issue related to peace and security-- this is the DPRK-U.S. confrontation. 
					
					 There can be no genuine peace in the absence of independence and equality. 
					
					 Had any other country found itself in the situation of the DPRK, it would have clearly realized that the DPRK has never chosen but was compelled to go nuclear in the face of the U.S. hostile policy and its nuclear threats. 
					
					 It has become an absolutely impossible option for the DPRK to even think about giving up its nuclear weapons. It makes no difference to the DPRK whether its nuclear status is recognized or not. 
					
					 Upon authorization, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK strongly condemns and rejects the UNSC "resolution 1874" and declares that it will take the following countermeasures at this early phase of all-out confrontation with the U.S. in order to defend the national dignity and the country's sovereignty. 
					
					 First: The whole amount of the newly extracted plutonium will be weaponized.
					
					 More than one third of the spent fuel rods has been reprocessed to date. 
					
					 Second: The process of uranium enrichment will be commenced.
					
					 Pursuant to the decision to build its own light-water reactor, enough success has been made in developing uranium enrichment technology to provide nuclear fuel to allow the experimental procedure. 
					
					 Third: An attempted blockade of any kind by the U.S. and its followers will be regarded as an act of war and met with a decisive military response. 
					
					 No mater how hard the U.S.-led hostile forces may try all sorts of isolation and blockade, the DPRK, a proud nuclear power, will not flinch from them. 
					
					 It is the Songun idea-based mode of counter-action for the DPRK to decisively counter "sanctions" with retaliation and "confrontation" with all-out confrontation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects KPA Division Command
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects KPA Division Command
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected the command of 7th Infantry Division of the KPA located in the eastern sector of the front.
					 After being saluted, Kim Jong Il dropped into the room devoted to the history of the division and recollected with deep emotion the shining course covered by the division.
					
					 Saying that the division is a unit of merit as it displayed the heroic stamina of the KPA by winning brilliant victories in every fierce battle during the Fatherland Liberation War to defeat the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces, he urged the servicepersons of the unit to inherit this proud tradition and demonstrate its invincible might in the battle for devotedly defending the country in the future, too.
					
					 Then he went round military lecture rooms after acquainting himself with the division's performance of duty.
					
					 Expressing great satisfaction over the fact that the division has been prepared to creditably perform its combat duty in any circumstance by making use of training equipment manufactured by it under the slogan of "Training Is Also a Battle!", he highly praised the unit's militant training spirit and set forth the tasks for increasing its combat ability in every way.
					
					 He also went round a servicemen's hall of the division, a library and supply service facilities to learn in detail about the performance of ideological education and supply service.
					
					 Noting with high appreciation that the division has provided admirable means for cultural education to prepare the servicepersons to be persons strong in ideology and faith firmly armed with the Songun revolutionary idea of the WPK and possessed of versatile knowledge and high level of cultural attainment, he underscored the need to fully prepare all the servicepersons to be heroes of Ri Su Bok and Kang Ho Yong types in the era of Songun who are possessed of the steadfast spirit for defending the socialist country.
					
					 He said while walking along compound of the division command that he felt refreshed to see the buildings spruced up in keeping with the requirements of the Songun era and many trees of good species including fruit trees planted there. And he highly estimated the division's revolutionary way of life and its militant way of unit management.
					
					 Acquainting himself in detail with capacity, principle of operation and performance of various combined processing equipment manufactured by the unit itself, he gave a high appreciation of the fact that its officers have provided better conditions for servicepersons' diet.
					
					 Very pleased to hear that the unit has given sincere assistance to the people inhabited around the unit under the slogan of "Let's help the people" to be loved by them, he stressed that the Korean People's Army which inherited the traditions of the anti-Japanese revolution should steadily display the traits of army-people unity.
					
					 He also went round the quarter of officers' dwelling houses newly built by the unit to learn in detail about their construction and gave his thanks to the builders and stressed the need for all other units to positively follow the example.
					
					 The unit has made great changes in combat and political training, unit management and other work as a whole, he noted, highly praising again its achievements made over the past years and expressing great hope and belief that all the servicepersons would more firmly defend the socialist gains achieved in blood with the arms of revolution.
					
					 Accompanying him were KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Arms Buildup Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Arms Buildup Blasted
						
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group is nowadays frantically beefing up ultra-modern war hardware under the pretext of the DPRK's nuclear test. A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a statement Saturday denouncing this. 
					 Citing facts to prove the south Korean puppet warmongers' recent frantic arms buildup, the statement branded this as an unpardonable wild act to incite confrontation with fellow countrymen that brought to light once again their despicable true colors as a shock brigade in executing the U.S. policy for a war of aggression against the DPRK, nuclear war servants and war maniacs.
					
					 The measures recently taken by the DPRK to bolster its nuclear deterrent were a quite just exercise of its legitimate right to self-defence as they were intended to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the nation and the peace of the country from the reckless and brigandish moves for confrontation and war against the DPRK on the part of the hostile forces including the U.S. and the south Korean puppets, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 It is, therefore, absolutely preposterous for the group of traitors to talk about "threats" from someone. 
					
					 The reality clearly proves that the group is rushing headlong into a war only, in disregard of the inter-Korean relations and the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is the steadfast stand of the DPRK to return fire for fire.
					
					 The group had better stop its rash acts, clearly understanding what the DPRK really meant when it clarified it would take practical actions similar to those done during the war time.

articles.title: Significant Day of DPRK Observed by Agricultural Workers
articles.content:
Significant Day of DPRK Observed by Agricultural Workers
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- A meeting of agricultural workers took place in Tongbong-ri, Hamju County, South Hamgyong Province on Friday to celebrate the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 A report delivered by Kang Chang Uk, chairman of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea, was followed by speeches. 
					
					 The reporter and the speakers said that his start of work at the Central Committee of the WPK on June 19, Juche 53 (1964) marked a noteworthy event as it carved out a bright future of the work to accomplish the Juche revolutionary cause.
					
					 They referred to the fact that while defending and carrying forward the idea and exploits of President Kim Il Sung in party-building, Kim Jong Il has built the WPK into a powerful staff steering the Songun revolutionary cause and a mother party serving the people and consolidated the single-minded unity of the leader, the party, the army and the people based on the Songun idea as firm as a rock.
					
					 They stressed that Kim Jong Il formulated the Songun politics as a main political mode under socialism and has wisely led the WPK, training the People's Army as a powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and building the powerful capacity for self-defence.
					
					 They vowed to significantly increase the agricultural production and, at the same time, turn the farm villages into a socialist land of bliss in the Songun era. 
					
					 A poem "We will further glorify the immortal cause of the leader through the increased production of rice" was recited at the meeting.

articles.title: Commemorative Stamp Issued
articles.content:
Commemorative Stamp Issued
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- A commemorative stamp (one kind of sheetlet) was brought out in the DPRK on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (June 19, 1964).
					 The sheetlet carries images of the leader who conducts energetic revolutionary activities. Printed on it are the words "Commemoration of the 45th anniversary of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea" and "Juche 53 (1964)-Juche 98 (2009)". 
					
					 It also reflects the Party Founding Memorial Tower and Kimjongilia, the immortal flower.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Bellicose Remarks Slammed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Bellicose Remarks Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) --The Lee Myung Bak group has gone mad with the ruckus for a war against the DPRK these days. Not content with groundlessly slandering the statements issued by the DPRK and measures for self-defence taken by it to cope with the grave situation created due to the Lee group's announcement of its full participation in the PSI, the group is busy letting loose a spate of rhetoric that the DPRK is "creating tensions" in the West Sea and contemplating "armed provocations" and the like.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 These bellicose remarks made by the puppets are a clear revelation of their criminal scenario to shift the responsibility for the extremely bedeviled situation on the Korean Peninsula on to the DPRK and to commit a reckless military provocation in the waters of the West Sea, availing themselves of the opportunity, in a bid to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The much ado made by the Lee group about "armed provocation" and "the creation of tensions" by someone, maliciously slandering the DPRK's exercise of its legitimate right to self-defence is nothing but sheer sophism making profound confusion of right and wrong. 
					
					 The touch and go situation prevailing in the waters of the West Sea at present is attributable to the reckless moves for military provocations stepped up by the Lee group, while floating the above-said wild rumors.
					
					 The war racket kicked up by the Lee group, raising a hue and cry over "military provocation" and "security crisis" allegedly created by the DPRK is intended to cover up its traitorous nature and mislead the angered public opinion in south Korea.
					
					 Now that the group's scenario for a war has been brought to light, the DPRK will strongly react to it with measures for practical actions as it has already declared. The traitors keen on the confrontation with fellow countrymen and the moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK are bound to face a merciless punishment.
					
					 The Lee group had better cool its heads heated with war fever and stop its rash acts.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Talk about "Dialogue" Dismissed as Cock-and-Bull Story
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Talk about "Dialogue" Dismissed as Cock-and-Bull Story
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak in a recent "radio speech" talked nonsense that the measure for self-defence taken by the DPRK would "spark off a nuclear arms race and make it difficult to achieve peaceful reunification through reconciliation and cooperation" and "north's access to nukes poses threats not only to the Korean Peninsula but to the rest of Northeast Asia." He went the lengths of calling for "solving south-north relations through dialogue and cooperation."
					 Commenting on this, a news analyst of Minju Joson Saturday observes:
					
					 The outbursts let loose by Lee are another provocation against the DPRK and a declaration of confrontation with it. He is, indeed, an ignoramus unaware of how the security of the nation and peace on the Korean Peninsula are preserved and a wicked traitor keen to prolong his remaining days through sycophancy toward the U.S. as he misinterprets the DPRK's nuclear deterrent for self-defence as "threats," zealously pursuant to the U.S. moves against the DPRK.
					
					 It is preposterous, indeed, for Lee to talk about "dialogue" and "cooperation" while disturbing peace and standing in the way of reunification by fully participating in the PSI. 
					
					 What is intolerable is that the traitor in his "speech" groundlessly pulled up the DPRK, asserting that the "north conducted a nuclear test and launched missiles one after another" when they were "mourning" the former "president's" death.
					
					 The DPRK had already clarified that it would not deal with such group of traitors to the nation like the Lee group any more as it regards compatriots as "an enemy." The traitor must be aware of this. But he is still behaving so impertinently as to talk about "dialogue" and "cooperation." This only suggests that he has a very abnormal state of mind. 
					
					 Civic and social organizations of south Korea are now intensifying their anti-"government" actions as evidenced by the publication of declarations on the situation one after another. This is an eruption of the south Koreans' pent-up resentment against the group of traitors which drove the former "president" into death and brought the north-south relations to total collapse.
					
					 The traitor would be well advised to make a proper apology to the south Koreans, well aware of what lashed the people into such fury. He had better stop talking rubbish slandering the DPRK and get his mental disease cured.

articles.title: June 15 Joint Declaration Praised as Signpost of National Reunification
articles.content:
June 15 Joint Declaration Praised as Signpost of National Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, was interviewed Saturday on the occasion of the 9th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Jo in the interview said that the publication of the June 15 joint declaration provided the banner giving impetus to the reunification movement in the idea of "By our nation itself." 
					
					 The Korean nation has dynamically waged the struggle for reunification under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration, he said, adding:
					
					 This is entirely the noble fruition of the outstanding and seasoned leadership provided by Kim Jong Il with noble patriotic intention. 
					
					 The mindset of the south Korean people boundlessly revering Kim Jong Il, legendary great man and peerless patriot, has culminated in the hot wind of revering him and defending and supporting his Songun politics. 
					
					 The south Korean people has advanced along the road of independent reunification under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration with reverence for him.
					
					 They are waging intensive struggle against the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group trying to bring back the fascist dictatorial rule and escalating inter-Korean confrontation and tension, holding high the slogans of independence, democracy and reunification.
					
					 No desperate moves of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad can undermine the validity and unbreakable vitality of the joint declaration nor can they dampen the will of the Korean compatriots to firmly adhere to and implement the joint declaration.
					
					 Thanks to the June 15 joint declaration, signpost of national reunification, the independent reunification is sure to be achieved.

articles.title: Total Elimination of Pro-American Dictatorial Forces Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Total Elimination of Pro-American Dictatorial Forces Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea released a statement on Wednesday calling for eliminating all the pro-U.S. dictatorial forces in the spirit of the June Popular Resistance.
					 Recalling that in June of 1987 streets of south Korea resounded with the shouts of "Down with the dictatorship!" protesting against murderer Chun Doo Hwan's tyranny, the statement said that the people's strong resistance that raged there made a new history of the struggle for democracy, dealing a telling blow at the fascist regime.
					
					 22 years have passed since then but the fascist dictatorship is reigning in this land again after murderer Lee Myung Bak came to power, it deplored, and continued: 
					
					 Lee drove evacuees, a worker and even the ex-"president" and an elder pro-reunification figure to death. He is desperately pursuing confrontation with the DPRK and war moves in a bid to totally scrap the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The democracy which had been achieved through the June Popular Resistance has been ruthlessly violated like this because it failed to root out the pro-U.S. dictatorial forces.
					
					 The descendants of man-killing dictators are still riding roughshod in this land, the statement noted, adding that a failure to eliminate all these dictatorial forces would let this vicious cycle of evils go on.
					
					 The statement called upon all forces of the progressive camp to unite close to make a clean sweep of the dictatorial forces and intensify the struggle for implementing the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: End to U.S. Military Occupation and Domination over S. Korea Urged
articles.content:
End to U.S. Military Occupation and Domination over S. Korea Urged
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League released a statement on Saturday, seven years since the killing of two middle schoolgirls by the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea.
					 Recalling that on June 13, 2002 soldiers of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces present in south Korea committed such shuddering atrocity as driving an armored car over two middle schoolgirls Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son on a road in Hyochon-ri, Yangju County (at that time), Kyonggi Province, killing both of them, the statement said:
					
					 Seven years have passed since then but the U.S. is still claiming that "it happened during the training" in a bid to mislead the public opinion, instead of making an apology for the atrocity.
					
					 The killing is an inevitable result of the disgraceful 60-odd-year history of submission and subjugation in which the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces are not accused even when their soldiers kill south Koreans and resort to violence against them as they please and the victims are not allowed even to protest against their grievous death.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Lee Myung Bak group is unhesitatingly committing such despicable sycophancy as totally leaving south Korea to the U.S. as its complete colony and a forward base of aggression and war.
					
					 The south Korean people are destined to meet the same miserable end as Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son met as long as the U.S. military presence and domination over south Korea continue and the group of traitors is allowed to stay in power.
					
					 The statement expressed conviction that the south Korean youth and students would courageously turn out in the dynamic struggle to put an end to the disgraceful 60-odd-year history of the GIs' occupation, force them to pay a thousand-fold price for the blood shed by Koreans and make a clean sweep of the pro-U.S. group of sycophants and traitors, firmly united with other people of various strata.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised in Mexico
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- Cuautemoc Amezcua Dromundo, first secretary of the C.C., the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, issued a statement on June 5 on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement said that the 45 year-long history of Kim Jong Il's  leadership over the WPK is shining as a heroic epic in which he laid a solid foundation for the socialist development in the DPRK and ushered in the glorious history of defending the country and building a great prosperous and powerful nation under the banner of Songun, an invincible treasured sword, by carrying forward the revolutionary idea and immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea and eternal leader of the Korean people.
					
					 Under his leadership the WPK has always emerged victorious as the organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people and the general staff of the Songun revolution and the Korean People's Army has displayed its might as the invincible army of Mt. Paektu, it noted.
					
					 It referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il has consolidated the single-minded unity of the Korean society in every way.
					
					 It stressed that the Korean people would frustrate the imperialist forces' challenge and offensive with the might of the single-minded unity stronger than nuclear weapons and fling open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 marking the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Bulletin Released by Mexican Organization
articles.content:
Bulletin Released by Mexican Organization
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism published the 24th issue of its bulletin on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Carried in the bulletin was a picture of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The bulletin in an article stressed that the last 45 years can be said to be a period during which the single-minded unity of the Korean society has been consolidated in every way under his leadership.
					
					 The single-minded unity is his revolutionary philosophy, it said, adding that under his guidance the DPRK could always win victories in the revolution and construction by dint of the unity.
					
					 The bulletin paid respects to Kim Jong Il, leader of the DPRK who achieved the single-minded unity no one can find in any other country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded in Different Countries
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- A seminar on General Secretary Kim Jong Il's exploits took place in the Czech Republic on June 4 on the occasions of the 45th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 9th publication anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Jaroslav Kafka, chairman of the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea and chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association, said at the seminar that Kim Jong Il has performed the undying feats for the development of the party and state after his start of work at the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 The greatest exploit of his is that he formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as an integrated system of idea, theory and method of Juche and realized the modeling of the whole party on the Juche idea, he stressed.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il provided the historic north-south summit in June 2000 and the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration, an epochal turn in the movement for Korea's reunification, in order to implement the President's last instructions for national reunification.
					
					 Meanwhile, a Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition was opened in Mexico on May 28 on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were Kim Jong Il's works and books and photos showing the achievements made by the DPRK in socialist construction and handicraft associated with the creative talent of the Korean people.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Politically Motivated Terror Slammed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Politically Motivated Terror Slammed
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia issued a statement on June 11 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak gang of man-killers for driving Roh Moo Hyun, former "president" of south Korea, to death.
					 The statement recalled that there occurred such a tragic case as the suicide committed by Roh Moo Hyun some days ago, cursing the south Korean society.
					
					 The suicide committed by the former "president" was a politically-motivated, premeditated and deliberate terror orchestrated by the United States and the south Korean pro-U.S. conservative forces, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 The U.S. and the above-said forces made desperate efforts to prevent Roh from winning in the "presidential election." After his victory in the election they showed bitterer rancor towards him and worked hard to suffocate him.
					
					 In order to prevent such tragedy from repeating itself in south Korea, it is necessary to break the iron chain of the U.S. domination and subjugation as early as possible and force Lee Myung Bak, the murderer who drove even his predecessor to death for the purpose of gratifying his political ambition, to step down immediately.
					
					 All Koreans will certainly force the Lee Myung Bak clique of gangsters to pay for its murder.

articles.title: MINREX anuncia resueltas contramedidas a "resolucion No.1874"
articles.content:
MINREX anuncia resueltas contramedidas a "resolucion No.1874"
Pyongyang, 13 de junio (ATCC) -- En relacion con que a instigacion de Estados Unidos, el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU aprobo la "resolucion de sancion" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea pretextando la segunda prueba nuclear de esta, el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC hizo publica el dia 13 la siguiente declaracion:
					El Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU aprobo por fin el dia 12 la "resolucion de sancion" contra la RPDC pretextando la segunda prueba nuclear de ella.
					
					  Esto deviene otro producto repugnante de la ofensiva impactante internacional bajo el auspicio de EE.UU., encaminada a deshacer la idea y el regimen escogidos por nuestro pueblo desarmandonos militarmente y asfixiandonos en lo economico.
					
					  Como si no bastara con esa "resolucion", EE.UU. y Japon concretan un sucio complot para reforzar respectivamente la "sancion" a nuestro pais inventando un paquete de rumores mentirosos como "billetes falsificados", el "narcotrafico", etc.
					
					  EE.UU. involucro mas profundamente al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU en sus maniobras para aplastar a la RPDC dando asi la coyuntura de agudo enfrentamiento sin precedente en la historia de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Este enfrentamiento fue causado por los ilegales actos coercitivos de EE.UU., que nego el legitimo derecho al lanzamiento de satelite de un Estado soberano, y por el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU al servicio de aquel.
					
					  La "declaracion presidencial" fechada 14 de abril del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, fabricada por EE.UU., no tiene ningun fundamento de la ley internacional y esta penetrada de la hostilidad y veto al pais con diferente sistema social y de la arrogancia y despotismo, segun los cuales los paises pequenos deben obedecer a los grandes.
					
					  Aunque nuestro pais es pequeno, es una potencia en los planos politico, ideologico y militar.
					
					  Si se tolera el acto coercitivo de EE.UU., la RPDC no podra realizar mas nunca el lanzamiento de satelite artificial, que si hacen otros, y sera privada una vez por todas del derecho al uso del cosmos.  
					
					    Nuestra segunda prueba nuclear es una medida de autodefensa, que se puso en practica frente a tal accion hostil a EE.UU. sin violar ningun derecho internacional.
					
					 En lo esencial, la confrontacion de hoy es mas el problema relativo a la soberania y la dignidad de la RPDC y el enfrentamiento entre esta y EE.UU. que un asunto sobre la paz y la seguridad.
					
					 Nunca habra una paz de verdad sin la independencia y la igualdad.
					
					 Si alguien estuviera en nuestra situacion, sabria de sobra que la posesion de armas nucleares nunca fue un deseo nuestro sino una opcion tomada inevitablemente frente a la politica hostil y la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. sobre nuestro pais.
					
					 A estas alturas, la renuncia de armas nucleares se hizo algo nunca realizable y totalmente imposible y no nos importa que alguien reconozca o no la posesion de estos artefactos por nuestro pais.
					
					 Por el encargo, el MINREX de la RPDC denuncia y rechaza categoricamente la "resolucion no. 1874" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y declara la adopcion de las siguientes contramedidas para defender la dignidad nacional y la soberania del pais en la actual etapa en que se inicio la confrontacion total con EE.UU.:
					
					 Primero, utilizaremos en armas toda la cantidad de plutonio que se extraiga nuevamente.
					
					 Actualmente, fueron retratadas mas de un tercio de la totalidad de barras usadas.
					
					 Segundo, entraremos en el enriquecimiento de uranio.
					
					 Segun la decision de construir por cuenta propia el reactor de agua ligera, se desarrollo con exito la tecnologia del enriquecimiento de uranio para el aseguramiento de combustible nuclear, la cual entro en la fase de prueba.
					
					 Tercero, responderemos rotundamente en lo militar en caso de que EE.UU. y sus satelites traten de bloquearnos considerandolo como un acto belico.
					
					 Por mucho que EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles intenten aislar y bloquear a la RPDC, esta digna portadora de armas nucleares no vacilara ni un comino.
					
					 Nuestro modo de reaccion basado en la idea del Songun (priorizacion militar) es responder rotundamente a la "sancion" con la represalia y a la "confrontacion" con el enfrentamiento total.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il inspecciona la Division de Infanteria no. 7 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il inspecciona la Division de Infanteria no. 7 del EPC
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la comandancia de la Division de Infanteria No. 7 del EPC, situada en la parte oriental del frente.
					  Tras recibir el parte de acogida, el Dirigente    Kim Jong Il recordo con profunda emocion la gloriosa trayectoria recorrida por la division en la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					  Destacando que la Division de Infanteria No. 7 es la unidad de muchos meritos, que mostro el impetu heroico del EPC al lograr fulminantes victorias en las encarnizadas batallas de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria para repeler a las fuerzas aliadas imperialistas, inclusive el imperialismo norteamericano, encomendo a los uniformados de ella que sigan demostrando el aspecto invencible en la batalla por defender la patria a costa de la vida dando continuidad a tal tradicion orgullosa.
					
					  A continuacion, se informo del estado de cumplimiento de la mision por la division y paso revista a las aulas de leccion miliar.
					
					  Muy satisfecho de que bajo la consigna "!El entrenamiento es tambien una batalla!", esa unidad se prepara usando los aparatos de entrenamiento hechos por cuenta propia para cumplir satisfactoriamente su mision de combate en cualesquier circunstancias, aprecio mucho el combativo modo de ejercicio de la unidad y presento las tareas para incrementar por todos los medios la combatividad de ella.
					
					  El Dirigente recorrio la casa de los militares de la division, la biblioteca y las instalaciones de intendencia cerciorandose en detalles de la situacion de la educacion ideologica y la intendencia para los militares.
					
					   El Dirigente evaluo altamente el hecho de que la division arma a los militares con la idea revolucionaria del Songun (priorizacion militar) del PTC y les forma como los fuertes en la idea y la conviccion, provistos de conocimientos multifaceticos y alto nivel cultural, aprovechando magnificos medios culturales y educacionales.
					
					  Agrego que se debe preparar a todos los militares como Ri Su Bok y Kang Ho Yong (heroes de la pasada guerra coreana) de la epoca del Songun, que poseen la firme disposicion de defender la patria socialista.
					
					 Paseando por el recinto de la division, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il dijo sentirse refrescado al ver los edificios construidos magnificamente conforme a la demanda de la epoca del Songun y muchos arboles de buena variedad, incluyendo los frutales, plantados aqui, y aprecio mucho el modo de vida revolucionario y el estilo combativo de la administracion de la unidad de los militares.
					
					  El Dirigente averiguo detalladamente la capacidad, el principio y el estado de funcionamiento de varios equipos de procesamiento universal, fabricados por cuenta propia en la unidad, y elogio a los comandantes de ella que prepararon a los militares mejores condiciones de vida alimentaria.
					
					 Se puso muy contento cuando recibio la informacion de que la unidad es adorada por los habitantes de la zona de acampamento porque les ayuda mucho con la consigna pertinente en alto.
					
					 Enfatizo que nuestro ejercito popular, heredero de la tradicion de la guerrilla antijaponesa, debe demostrar continuamente los hermosos rasgos de la unidad entre el ejercito y el pueblo.
					
					 Acto seguido, el Dirigente estuvo en el reparto de las viviendas nuevamente construidas para los oficiales en esta unidad, donde se entero en detalles del estado de construccion y expreso agradecimiento a los constructores llamando a todas las demas unidades a seguir este ejemplo.
					
					 Volvio a reconocer los exitos logrados anteriormente por esta unidad subrayando que ella trajo muchos cambios en todas sus labores como el entrenamiento combativo y politico y la administracion del destacamento.
					
					 Expreso la gran esperanza y conviccion de que todos los uniformados defenderan con mas firmeza las conquistas del socialismo alcanzadas con sangre empunando con mas fuerza los fusiles de la revolucion.
					
					 Le acompanaron los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia el incremento de equipos belicos en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia el incremento de equipos belicos en el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 13 de junio (ATCC) -- En relacion con que ultimamente, la banda de Lee Myung Bak se enfrasca en el aumento de equipos belicos ultramodernos bajo el pretexto de la segunda prueba nuclear de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el vocero del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica este sabado una declaracion.
					Citando los datos referentes al acalorado aumento de los sofisticados medios belicos por parte de los belicistas titeres surcoreanos, la nota lo condeno calificando de imperdonable accion en pro de la confrontacion fratricida que volvio a desenmascarar la asquerosa naturaleza de ellos que son la brigada de mercenarios a cargo de implementar la politica norteamericana de desatar la guerra nuclear contra la RPDC. 
					
					Insistio en que las medidas para el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear tomadas recientemente por la RPDC constituyen el ejercicio del sumamente justo derecho a la autodefensa para salvaguardar la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion y la paz del pais desde las imprudentes y gangsteriles maniobras conflictivas y belicistas anti-RPDC de las fuerzas hostiles como EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Pese a esta realidad, la banda del traidor Lee habla ridiculamente de la supuesta "amenaza" de alguien, critico.
					
					Subrayo que la realidad demuestra patentemente que la pandilla de Lee actua desesperadamente con la unica meta de provocar la guerra sin tomar en consideracion las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas ni la paz ni la estabilidad.
					
					Ratifico que la RPDC se mantiene en su invariable posicion de castigar con el fuego a los que prefieren la llama.
					
					La banda de Lee debe actuar con prudencia al sopesar que significan las medidas practicas de accion correspondientes al tiempo de guerra, que ya hemos anunciado, concluyo.

articles.title: Entidad juvenil llama a la lucha antiyanqui y anti-"gubernamental"
articles.content:
Entidad juvenil llama a la lucha antiyanqui y anti-"gubernamental"
Pyongyang, 13 de junio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 7o aniversario del asesinato de dos alumnas surcoreanas de secundaria por las tropas agresoras norteamericanas, el vocero del CC de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung hizo publica el dia 13 una declaracion que senala:
					  El 13 de junio de 2002, los agresores norteamericanos ocupantes del Sur de Corea asesinaron atropellando cruelmente con un carro blindado a Sin Hyo Sun y Sim Mi Son, pequenas alumnas de la escuela secundaria, en la carretera de la comuna de Hyochon del distrito de Yangju de la provincia de Kyonggi.
					
					  Aunque pasaron 7 anos desde entonces, EE.UU. no pide disculpas todavia, al contrario, trata de enganar a la opinion publica diciendo que ese "caso sucedio durante un ejercicio militar".
					
					  Este asesinato deviene el resultado inevitable de la vergonzosa historia de mas de 60 anos en que las tropas norteamericanas andan impunes aunque maten y usen la violencia a su antojo contra los habitantes surcoreanos y estos ni siquiera pueden formular las protestas por la injusta muerte de sus compatriotas.
					
					  Pero, la banda de Lee Myung Bak comete sin vacilacion el repugnante acto servil a EE.UU. convirtiendo el Sur de Corea en la colonia totalmente dependiente de ese imperio y la base avanzada de este para la agresion y la guerra.
					
					  Mientras que persistan la ocupacion y la dominacion militares de EE.UU. sobre el Sur de Corea y se mantenga en el poder la banda de los vendepatrias, la poblacion surcoreana no podra evitar jamas el tragico destino de Sin Hyo Sun y Sim Mi Son.
					
					  Por ultimo, la nota expreso la conviccion de que todos los jovenes y estudiantes del Sur de Corea, unidos firmemente con los habitantes de distintos sectores, se levantaran con valentia en la lucha por pasar la cuenta de la vergonzosa historia de ocupacion de mas de 60 anos, cobrar mil veces el precio de sangre derramada por nuestra nacion y barrer a la banda de los vendepatrias serviles a EE.UU.
